metadata.description: Would you want to live forever? What if you didn’t have a choice? That’s the premise behind Last Mortal, a story that also hammers home that every choice we make has its consequences. Alec King is a born loser and a career failure. When he and his criminal partner get in over their heads with an attempted assassination of a mayoral candidate, Alec hits rock bottom and takes his own life...only to discover he cannot die! Recollecting the hard-hitting noir tale of revenge, this edition offers the complete four-issue series now fully colored along with a brand-new epilogue.
metadata.name: Last Mortal
